name: Drill Planet
description:
Use your mega space drill to bore through planets and destroy the pests that have infected these planets.

Instructions:

  • Left and right arrow keys move your character
  • Down arrow drills
  • You must attack snails from below and then run into them to destroy them.
  • Kill all snails to spawn the next wave.
  • Think about the good you are causing
